explains: adj. 声誉好的，值得信赖的

sentences.en: You are well advised to buy your car through a reputable dealer.
sentences.cn: 你通过一个声誉好的经销商来买车是明智的。

sentences.en: The bigger, more reputable online casinos are not going to rip you off.
sentences.cn: 规模更大、声誉更好的网上赌场不会宰你。

sentences.en: Is it a bona fide, reputable organization?
sentences.cn: 这是不是个合法的、值得信赖的机构？
